# Docs

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://docs.idriss.xyz/readme): Apps uniquely enabled by crypto and AI
- [Extension](https://docs.idriss.xyz/user-guides/extension): Crypto and AI expansion pack for your browser
- [Creators](https://docs.idriss.xyz/user-guides/creators): Monetize your content on Twitch, YouTube, and more
- [Prediction markets](https://docs.idriss.xyz/user-guides/prediction-markets): Decentralized community notes for the internet
- [Tokenomics](https://docs.idriss.xyz/idriss-token/tokenomics)
- [Retroactive distribution](https://docs.idriss.xyz/idriss-token/retroactive-distribution)
- [Governance](https://docs.idriss.xyz/idriss-token/governance)
- [Token sale](https://docs.idriss.xyz/idriss-token/token-sale)
- [Terms and conditions](https://docs.idriss.xyz/idriss-token/terms-and-conditions)
- [Brand](https://docs.idriss.xyz/resources/brand)
- [Terms of service](https://docs.idriss.xyz/resources/terms-of-service)
- [Privacy policy](https://docs.idriss.xyz/resources/privacy-policy)
